title: Lazygit-style keyboard shortcut hint modal (? key)
description:
Add a modal triggered by pressing '?' that shows all configured keyboard shortcuts in Pi.

Features:
- Shows all keybindings from Pi core and extensions
- Each shortcut shows its source (core vs which extension)
- Extensions get their own collapsible submenu/group in the list — press Enter to expand and see that extension's shortcuts
- Keeps the list manageable even with many extensions installed
- Inspired by lazygit's ? help modal

Reference: Pi keybindings docs and extension API for discovering registered shortcuts.

title: Get journalctl working for Rocky Talky user service
description: journalctl --user shows 'No journal files were found' for rocky-talky.service. Currently working around it with StandardOutput=append:/tmp/rocky-talky.log. Need to either fix user journald (check /var/log/journal permissions, loginctl enable-linger, Storage=persistent in /etc/systemd/journald.conf) or formalize the file-based logging.

title: Frontend: Poll for subagent completion after stream ends
description: When the 'done' SSE event arrives and subagents are still 'running', start polling GET /api/sessions/:id/subagents every 3s until all subagents are completed/failed. Update SubagentPanel state accordingly.

title: Code blocks don't render well in Rocky Talky chat
description:
WHY: Ak reads my responses on his phone via Rocky Talky. Code blocks (triple backtick) render poorly in the mobile chat UI — likely just showing as raw text or breaking layout.

WHAT: Add proper code block rendering to the Rocky Talky frontend. Needs syntax highlighting or at minimum a monospace styled container with background differentiation.

WHERE: app/frontend/ — likely the message rendering component that handles markdown.

HOW: Check what markdown rendering library we're using (if any), add or configure code block support. May need a lightweight syntax highlighter like Prism or highlight.js, or at minimum CSS for pre/code tags.

title: Subagent panel stays stuck on 'running' after agent completes
description: The subagent_complete SSE event never reaches the frontend because it fires after the main agent stream (and SSE connection) has closed. Two-part fix needed: (1) Backend: keep SSE connection alive until spawned subagents complete, or use polling/separate endpoint. (2) Frontend: handle subagent lifecycle independently of the main stream.

title: Backend: notify() callback should persist subagent completion to DB
description: Move subagent_complete DB update logic from stream.ts into the agentBridgeService notify() callback, so completion is persisted regardless of whether the SSE stream is still open.

title: Backend: Add GET endpoint for subagent status polling
description: Add GET /api/sessions/:id/subagents that returns subagent records from DB. Frontend needs this to poll for completion after the main SSE stream closes.

title: Fix E2E webServer timeout in CI (Playwright 30s timeout)
Debug mobile chat bubble sizing — bubbles grow too large after initial messages
description: The mobile experience starts fine but chat bubbles get too big once conversation gets going. Need to investigate CSS/layout issues causing bubble expansion. Approach: heavily utilize e2e tests and screenshot skill for visual regression at various viewport sizes. Consider interactive video capture for debugging dynamic behavior.

title: E2E tests for subagent lifecycle (spawn → running → completed)
description: Playwright E2E tests that verify the subagent panel UI transitions correctly. Mock at the Pi SDK boundary (not our parsing layer) so tests use the real MCP object format and real Sirdar notify format. Would have caught the [object Object] and emoji regex bugs.

title: Mock Pi session fixture with realistic SDK event shapes
description: Create a mock Pi session that produces events in the exact format the real SDK does: MCP-shaped tool results, Sirdar notify with emoji prefix. Wire into agentBridgeService via _setSDKForTesting. Env var AGENT_MODE=mock to activate.

title: Add data-testid attributes to SubagentPanel components
description: Add testids: subagent-panel, subagent-card, subagent-status, subagent-description.

title: Playwright spec: subagent spawn → running → completed
description: E2E test that sends a message triggering a mock subagent spawn, verifies panel shows running then transitions to completed. Uses mock Pi session fixture.
